text: God Save the Queen is a song by English punk rock band The Sex Pistols. It was the band's second single, and featured on their only album, Never Mind the Bollocks, Here's the Sex Pistols. The lyrics, as well as the cover, were controversial at the time. The BBC banned the song. It has been covered by various bands, including Motorhead. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Sex Pistols songs Category:Mot√∂rhead songs
title: God Save the Queen (Sex Pistols song)
